Label: util_asc
Description: Alternative-specific constant

Description: Joint tour purpose is eating out (dummy)

Description: Joint tour purpose is discretionary (dummy)

Description: Number of Full-Time Workers in the household

Label: util_number_of_part_time_workers
Description: Number of Part-Time Workers in the household

Label: util_number_of_university_students
Description: Number of University students in the household

Label: util_number_of_non_workers
Description: Number of Non-Workers in the household

Label: util_number_of_children_too_young_for_school
Description: Number of Children too Young for School in the household

Label: util_number_of_pre_driving_age_children
Description: Number of Pre-driving Age Children in the household

Label: util_number_of_driving_age_children
Description: Number of Driving-age Children in the household

Label: util_low_income_households
Description: Low income households (dummy)

Label: util_medium_income_households
Description: Medium income households (dummy)

Label: util_household_has_more_cars_than_workers
Description: Household has more cars than workers (dummy)

Label: util_household_in_urban_area
Description: Household is located in an urban area type (dummy)

Label: util_household_in_suburban_area
Description: Household is located in a suburban area type (dummy)

Label: util_log_max_overlap_of_adults_time_windows
Description: Log of max pair-wise overlap of household adults time windows

Label: util_log_max_overlap_of_childrens_time_windows
Description: Log of max pair-wise overlap of household childrens time windows

Label: util_log_max_overlap_of_time_windows

Label: util_two_acive_adults
Description: Two adults must have Mand or Non Mand activity patterns to have adult-only joint travel

Label: util_two_active_children
Description: Two children must have Mand or Non Mand activity patterns to have children-only joint travel

Label: util_travel_active_adult
Description: At least one adult and at least one child must have Mand or Non Mand activity patterns to have adult/child joint travel
